rules.text: AWA + [conflict]: Evade [2] the violently swirling columns of air to discard 1 strength for every 2 effort. If there is no strength on this feature, discard it.
Move this feature. If you move it to an area with no other cards, add 1 strength to it.
Move a card in the same area as this feature. If you move it within reach of a Ranger, it fatigues that Ranger.
Clear [progress] or [harm]: [Campaign Log Entry] 90
If there is another active flora, exhaust it. »» Shuffle this being into the path deck as it disappears in a geometric tangle of vines.
If there is an active prey, exhaust it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that prey's presence.
Response: After a human with your [Ranger Token] is cleared, move your [Ranger Token] to this feature. Read [Campaign Log Entry] 67 instead of that human's standard entry.
Clear [harm]: Remove all [Ranger Tokens] and all [progress] from humans.
Clear [Ranger Tokens]: [Campaign Log Entry] 67.1
Each Ranger whose [Ranger Token] is on a human must move their [Ranger Token] to another human with no [Ranger Token] and that human within reach of themselves.
Ambush.
Move this predator
Add 1 mucus token to the location. If there are 3 or more, discard them. »» Search the General set for a Reclaimer Polyp.
If you have 2 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
Clear [harm]: The polyp bursts open! Search the General set for 2 Reclaimer Grubs.
Add 1[harm] to this feature.
Response: When you interact with this prey, it fatigues you.
Add 1 growth. If there are 3 or more, it grows. »» Discard this prey and search the General set for a Reclaimer Seeker.
If you suffered fatigue during this test, you touch the grub's corrosive slime. »» Suffer 1 injury.
If there is an active predator, discard it. »» Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.

Response: When this card enters play or its attached card leaves play without being cleared, attach it to the feature or being from the path deck with the highest presence that doesn't already have a Flood attached. Move that card along the way. If there are no cards to attach to: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.06
Add a flood token to the attached card.
If the number of flood tokens on the attached card is greater than its presence, »» Discard it. Each Ranger suffers 3 fatigue.
Response: When there is no damage on this feature: [Campaign Log Entry] 95
FIT + [reason]: Repair [2] the damage caused by the raging waters to discard 1 damage.
Ambush.
Clear [harm]: If this feature is within reach of a Ranger, that Ranger suffers 2 injuries. If it is along the way, remove all [progress] from the location.
Move this feature.
Add 1[harm] to this feature.
